entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is described as wearing her free Spectrespecs and having a knack for embarrassing honesty. She is also mentioned as being friends with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having cooler friends than the Ministry of Magic and fighting against Voldemort.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as a place where people expect Harry to have friends from, but it is also stated that none of his friends were there.

entities.name: trevor
entities.description: Trevor is described as being resigned-looking and in the hand of Neville.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as emerging from under a seat with fluff and dust in his hair and holding Trevor.

relationships.description: Harry's friends were not at the Ministry of Magic, implying that Harry is not a member of the Ministry.
Luna is described as being friends with Harry.
